Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
struct stMTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::tMHeader

This structure defines the MTree header structure. This type was left public to allow the creation of debug tools.

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
char stMTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::tMHeader::Magic[4]
 

Magic number. This is a short string that must contains the magic string "M__3". It may be used to validate the file (this feature is not implemented yet).
